name: next2d-development-mcp
description: MCP server for Next2D application development assistance

scripts.copy-refs: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p=require('path');const src=p.join('.github','skills','references');const dst=p.join('dist','references');fs.mkdirSync(dst,{recursive:true});fs.readdirSync(src).filter(f=>f.endsWith('.md')).forEach(f=>fs.copyFileSync(p.join(src,f),p.join(dst,f)));console.log('Copied references to dist/references/')"

author: Next2D
